content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Use-case: Converts iron ore and coal into iron plates to support subsequent crafting operations.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0)
Use-case: Smelts copper ore using coal to produce copper plates needed for downstream production processes.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Misuse – When using get_entities, ensure its signature is followed exactly. Avoid unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and prevent passing unexpected positional arguments.
• Inventory Check Prior to Placement – Before attempting to place structures (for example, a Lab), confirm that the required item is present in inventory.
• Validating Collection Returns – When iterating over entities returned by functions like get_entities, first check that the return value is not None.
• Crafting Prerequisite Verification – Confirm that all sub-ingredients and intermediate products (iron plates for iron-gear-wheels, copper plates for copper cables, and further components for electronic circuits) are available before initiating lab crafting.
• Resource Chain Assurance – Ensure that smelting and other production chains are adequately set up so that missing ingredient errors (such as shortages of iron-gear-wheels or copper cables) are avoided during lab production attempts.
